Subject: Introduction to Beserk 3...

From: wilddance_mare@...

The scientist team let Beserk roam around the first floor of the 
building. He seemed calm and under control, thanks to the additional 
motherboard. Plus, he was a curious bot. He looked like a newborn, 
discovering things and testing what he could do. He enjoyed using his 
voice. Techy had even gotten him singing one day with her in his 
cell, which made Sky Knight laugh. A killer that sang. 

He couldn't complain, he did have a nice voice. He just thought it 
was funny. The two had a duet going, after Beserk learned the words. 
He was a fast learner. And he understood. They found that some words 
he obeyed them competely. One that worked like a charm was "Stand 
down". Beserk would stop whatever he was doing, give a snarl if he 
was upset then back away with his arms crossed. They learned 
themselves to use that command if something got out of hand. 

Sky Knight and Techy watched as Beserk looked out the window. His 
massive black hand were on the radiator, while he leaned forward. 
They both watched as if he was a normal bot and they were his 
creators. 

There was still things that had to be done and settled before they 
took him out into public. First of all they had to make another 
report to the councilman that Beserk was doing fine and no mishaps 
occured. 

Beserk snarled in alarm. He backed up from the window and looked 
down. The radiator was hissing. Techy giggled lightly, making sure 
not to be loud enough to be heard. 

"The radiator just scared him," she said.

Sky Knight grinned in reply. Beserk walked off. The fur-like fabric 
on his shoulders flowed as he went.
